conbody.p: The Source Selection Training Modules, Trainerâ€™s Lesson Plans, and Resource/Reference Material are accessible by designated trainers and training managers on SharePoint at https://usaf.dps.mil/sites/AFCC/KnowledgeCenter/source_selection_training/Forms/AllItems.aspx . Additional training materials for teams are available in the AFFARS Library, Part 5315 .
